EnvironmentVariable.name: META_OWNER
EnvironmentVariable.description: Userid that owns the Metamodel Schema

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_OWNER
EnvironmentVariable.description: Userid that owns the GSDM Schema

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_APPUSER
EnvironmentVariable.description: Application User that uses the database

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_SMALL_DATA_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM small data space

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_SMALL_INDEX_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM small index space

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_MEDIUM_DATA_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM medium data space

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_MEDIUM_INDEX_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM medium index space

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_LARGE_DATA_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM large data space

EnvironmentVariable.name: GSDM_LARGE_INDEX_TS
EnvironmentVariable.description: Name of the GSDM large index space

replace.name: Replace Environment Variables
replace.description: Replaces the Environment Variables with your specified value
